info.title: Qx REST API
info.description: API for remote control of key areas of Qx functionality. Correct as of Qx software version 5.4. This document applies to Qx units running in "IP 2110" firmware mode only.

400.description: "analyserMode" expected in JSON request body
"flowSelect" expected in JSON request body
"action" expected and "multicastRequests" expected when "action" has values "join" or "leave" in JSON request body
"selectedFlowsConfig" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "aes1", "aes2", "aes3", "aes4", "passthroughSource" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "systemTrOffset", "customTrOffset", "gappedMode", "readOffset", "scalingFactor", "reset", "interface" expected in JSON request body

One or more of "identifierSelect", "did", "sdid", "rangeSelect", "firstLine", "lastLine", "yPosCPosSelect", "triggerOnlyOnErrors", "searchChecksumErrors", "searchParityErrors" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "reset" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "ballistics" expected in JSON request body

One or more of "audioAssignment", "standard", "meterTarget", "meterTolerance", "truePeakAlarm", "action", "logDuration_mins", "logLifetime_days", "logFilename", "control" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "source", "action" expected in JSON request body

404.description: The requested resource could not be found

400.description: "action" expected in JSON request body

"action" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "dnsSearchDomain", "nmosNode", "receiverMode", "getSystemConfigFromIS09" expected in JSON request body
"action" expected and "newPresetName" expected when "action" has value "rename" in JSON request body
"action" expected and "newFilename" expected when "action" has value "rename" in JSON request body
"ipAddress", "gateway", "mask" expected in JSON request body
"ipAddress", "gateway", "mask" expected in JSON request body
"enabled" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "igmpMaxVersion", "domain", "commMode", "latencyOffset", "announceReceiptGracePeriod", "delayReqInterval", "delayReqIntervalOverride", "engineEnabled" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "action" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "igmpMaxVersion", "domain", "commMode", "latencyOffset", "announceReceiptGracePeriod", "delayReqInterval", "delayReqIntervalOverride", "engineEnabled" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "action" expected in JSON request body
One or more of "systemReferenceType", "action", "wrapVideoTiming", "wrapMargin", "wrapRtpOffset", "trOffset" expected in JSON request body
